2- Install mdSilo.md.title: 2- Install mdSilo
2- Install mdSilo.md.content:
# To Install on Your Desktop

mdSilo Desktop is a cross-platform desktop app, available for Windows, macOS and Linux.

Get the Desktop App here: <https://github.com/mdSilo/mdSilo/releases> ,  It is 10MB only.

# To Install on Your Mobile

mdSilo web app is also a PWA (Progressive Web App). This means that you can install it on your mobile. #done#
You can take and network your writing anywhere, anytime, entirely in your browser.

\
We are also working on the Mobile App. #todo#

## Chrome | Edge | Brave | Chromium

* Tap the "`Add to Home Screen"` banner on the bottom of your screen to install mdSilo.

OR

* Tap the 3 dots in the top right, then `Install App`.

## Safari

* Tap the "`Share"` button, then tap "`Add to Home Screen`."

## Firefox

* Tap the 3 dots in the top right, then tap `Install`.

\

7- Control Your Data.md.title: 7- Control Your Data
7- Control Your Data.md.content:
You fully own and control your data. Even the code can be in your control.

# Local Folder

Writing completely offline using the tiny but powerful Desktop App, your data is on your computer.

\
If you like writing on web and your web browser supports local file system access, you can also write in a local folder. Some web browsers that support the File System Access API (Edge and Chrome) allow web pages to access the local file system with your permission.

\
You can set up any cloud sync service you trust for your data on the said local folder.

# One Single JSON File

On Web App, You can export and import your data as a single JSON file and store it in a local folder or cloud or IPFS.

Just start writing, export (save) works as a JSON file, then import(open) the JSON file and continue writing.

# Plain Text Markdown Files

You can always import and export Markdown files. Markdown is widely used and can be edited by text editors or Markdown editors.

It is useful when you want to move your data or publish your work on other services.

1- Welcome to mdSilo.md.content:
# mdSilo

A lightweight, local-first personal wiki and knowledge base for storing ideas, thought, knowledge with a powerful all-in-one writing tool.

\
Join [Discord](https://discord.gg/EXYSEHRTFt) or [Download here](https://github.com/mdSilo/mdSilo/releases)

## Features

* All-In-One Editor: Markdown, WYSIWYG, MindMap...
* [Markdown and extensions](3-_Enjoy_Writing): Diagram, Table, Math/Chemical, Code block(Highlight)...
* Slash commands, Hovering toolbar, hotkeys and more toolkits...
* Chronicle view, Graph view, Task view...
* Build personal wiki with [bidirectional wiki links](6-_Connect_Everything); 
* Full-text search;
* Dark and Light Mode
* Available for [Windows, macOS, Linux and Web](2-_Install_mdSilo),
* On top of [local plain-text files](4-_Organize_Writings), no registration required, [no privacy issue](7-_Control_Your_Data).

## Tech Stack

* Editor Framework: [ProseMirror](https://prosemirror.net/)
* Frontend Framework: [React](https://reactjs.org/)
* Cross-platform:  [Tauri](https://tauri.studio/)

## Road map

* Markdown
  - [x] Style: **Bold**, *Italic*, ~~Strikethrough~~, `Inline Code`
  - [x] Link: [mdSilo](https://mdsilo.com) and <https://mdsilo.com>,
  - [x] Image: `![]()` and local image
  - [x] Headings and TOC,
  - [x] List item: ordered list, bullet list, check list and nested list
  - [x] Table
  - [x] Blockquotes
  - [x] Horizontal Rules
* Markdown extension
  - [x] more style: `==mark==`, `__underline__`, `1^sup^`
  - [x] Highlight code block
  - [x] Math and Chemical Equation: inline `$\KaTeX$` and block `$$\LaTeX$$`
  - [x] Notice block: info, warning, tips
  - [x] Wikilink: `[[]]`
  - [x] Hashtag: `#tag#`
  - [x] Diagram: mermaid, echarts, music notation...
  - [x] Embed web page: YouTube, Figma...
  - [x] Attach local PDF file
* Writing, formatting and drawing
  - [x] WYSIWYG, Markdown, MindMap and Split view
  - [x] Slash commands
  - [x] Hovering toolbar
  - [x] hotkeys
  - [ ] Drawing
* View
  - [x] Graph
  - [x] Task
  - [x] Chronicle
* Organize writings
  - [x] Folder management
  - [x] Backlinks
  - [x] Recent history
  - [ ] Block reference
  - [ ] Flashcards
  - [ ] Export as PDF,HTML, ...
  - [ ] Version control: git integration
* Cross-Platform
  - [x] Windows, macOS, Linux.
  - [x] Web
  - [ ] Mobile: iOS/iPadOS and Android(coming soon...)

\

8- More Questions?.md.title: 8- More Questions?
8- More Questions?.md.content:
If you have more questions, feedback, suggestions, feature requests, or need help, please follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mdsiloapp) or go to our [Discord](https://discord.gg/EXYSEHRTFt).  We are waiting there for you.

\
Like any other software, there would be some bugs or some features have not implemented, here are some stopgap measures for these cases.

| Known Issues | Stopgap Measures |
|----|----|
| Rename file/folder on Mac: no live update | reload the app |

We are working on some features:

| Features (WIP) | Stopgap Measures |
|:---:|:---|
| Export | Open the file in Web App, utilize the browser’s Print feature to save as PDF. |
| Version Control | Setup the git in the local work folder or use any other cloud sync service you trust. |
| Code signing and self updater | Need to download the newer version and ignore some notices when installing. |
| Mobile App | Use [Web App on mobile](2-_Install_mdSilo) as it is a PWA, need to export the notes as a JSON file to save the works. |

\

6- Connect Everything.md.title: 6- Connect Everything
6- Connect Everything.md.content:
# Backlink and Graph

Link your writings together to form personal knowledge graph. [Visualize the networked thoughts](5-_Different_Views) and get further inspiration.

## How to link?

Just type double square brackets `[[` and some characters.  There will be some notes searched out for you to choose from.  If there are not any notes, when you type end square brackets `]]`, a new note will be created.


:::info
Just try it out here: start typing `[[` ....

:::

# More Linking

**For External Link**,  just paste the URL or add link to the selected text.

**For Mentions**, link the note to the text which is same as the title of the note.

3- Enjoy Writing.md.title: 3- Enjoy Writing
3- Enjoy Writing.md.content:
mdSilo is equipped with a powerful writing tool.

# WYSIWYG Markdown

Most Markdown elements and shortcuts can be used in mdSilo and previewed in real time.

* Heading  `#`
* Bulleted List `-`,
* Numbered List   `1.`
* Quote Block  `>`
* Code Block  \`\`\`
* Check List  `[]`
* External Link
* Link to Image
* Styling Text: Bold, Italic, ...

## Markdown Shortcuts

> Quote block: typing `>` to quote. Support ==Inline style== :  **Bold**,  *Italic*, __underline__, `inline code`, and more.

### List Items

#### Bullet List

* Type `-` or `*` to create bullet list(unordered list).
* Nested list is supported.
  * This is nested list item.
  * `Mod + [ or ] ` can lift or sink the nested list item.
* `Enter` to add more list item.
* `Alt + ArrowUp or ArrowDown` can move list item up or down.

#### Numbered List


1. Type `1.` to create numbered list(ordered list).
2. Nested numbered list is supported.

#### Check List(Task List)

- [x] Type `[]` to create Check list.
- [x] Support nested Check list too.
- [x] Main task.
  - [x] Sub task.
- [x] Support drag and move.

### Table

* Insert table by typing `/table` and then select Table command;
* You can resize table via floating toolbar;

| Features | mdSilo | Note | Pricing |
|----|:---:|----|---:|
| Mode | Yes | Raw Markdown mode, WYSIWYG mode, Mindmap mode | Free |
| Writing | Yes | Slash Commands, Hovering Toolbar, Hotkeys | Free |
| Linking | Yes | BackLinks, Mentions | Free |
| View | Yes | Chronicle, Graph, Task | Free |
| WYSIWYG | Yes | Markdown and extension: Code, Math... | Free |
| Table | Yes | Insert Table, Add or Remove Row or Culumn | Free |
| Notice | Yes | Information, Tips, Warning | Free |
| Code Fence | Yes | Code Block and Highlight | Free |
| Math | Yes | Math Equation($LaTex$): inline or block | Free |
| Diagram | Yes | mermaid(Flowchart, Sequence...), echarts, ABC Notation | Free |

### Code block and highlight

* Quickly add code using the \`\`\` shortcut;
* Insert code using /code and select Code Block command;

```javascript
function main() {
  console.log("Hello World, mdSilo is neat!");
}
```

Try to change the language to see the changes on highlight.

```rust
fn main() {
  println!("Hello World, nice mdSilo");
}
```

### Image support

* Insert image using `![caption](image_link)`

 ![A cat, Image credits: Dorota Dylka@unsplash](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1456677698485-dceeec22c7fc)

* Local Image support too.

## Markdown Extensions

* Math and chemical equation: inline  `$LaTeX$` and block `$$LaTeX$$`.
* Notice block: info, warning, tips.
* Wiki Link: `[[]]`.
* Hashtag: `#tag#` #tips#
* Diagram: mermaid, echarts, ABC Notation.

### WikiLink and Hashtag

To organize and [network writing](6-_Connect_Everything) and thoughts even better. #tips#

### Math and chemical equations

* Quickly add inline equation using the `$equation$` and equation block using `$$` and a space;
* Insert $\LaTeX$ equations using /math and select Math Equation command;

> source code for math equation

```
$$
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}
$$
```

> Display the math equation

$$
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}
$$

* Support chemical equation block with `\ce`

$$
\ce{x Na(NH4)HPO4 ->[\Delta] (NaPO3)_x + x NH3 ^ + x H2O}
$$

* Support Live preview for Math/Chemical equation block.

### Diagram, Charts and Music Notation

* Diagram: mermaid (Flowchart, Sequence, Gantt and more)

```mermaid
flowchart LR
    A[Start] --> B{Is it?}
    B -- Yes --> C[OK]
    C --> D[Rethink]
    D --> B
    B -- No ----> E[End]
```

# Writing and Formatting toolkit

## Slash command

Just type `/` or `\` to trigger slash command. This helps make insert block easier.

### Quick Action

* Insert current date, time or datetime using `/date`, `/time`, `/now` and a space.

## Hovering Toolbar

When you select any text, a toolbar with many icons will appear; this is the hovering toolbar, which can help format your writing.

## Hotkeys

mdSilo has many keyboard shortcuts to help you do things faster.  Just pay a bit of attention to the tooltips to learn more.

### Frequently Used

| Function | Hotkeys (Windows / Linux) | Hotkeys (macOS) |
|:---|----|----|
| Toggle Sidebar | Ctrl + x | Cmd + x |
| New Writing | Ctrl + n | N/A |
| Chronicle view | Ctrl + Shift + c | Cmd + Shift + c |
| Graph view | Ctrl + Shift + g | Cmd + Shift + g |
| Task view | Ctrl + Shift + t | Cmd + Shift + t |
| Silo Tab (File List) | Ctrl + Shift + d | Cmd + Shift + d |
| Search Tab | Ctrl + Shift + f | Cmd + Shift + f |
| Hashtag Tab | Ctrl + Shift + h | Cmd + Shift + h |

\
### Writing

| Function | Hotkeys (Windows / Linux) | Hotkeys (macOS) |
|----|----|----|
| Insert Heading | Ctrl + 1 (2, 3, 4) | Ctrl + 1 (2, 3, 4) |
| Insert Task List | Ctrl + 7 | Ctrl + 7 |
| Insert Table | Ctrl + Shift + space | Cmd + Shift + space |
| Undo | Ctrl + z | Cmd + z |

\
### List Item

| Function | Hotkeys (Windows / Linux) | Hotkeys (macOS) |
|----|----|----|
| Lift nested item | Ctrl + \[ | Cmd + \[ |
| Sink nested item | Ctrl + \] | Cmd + \] |
| Move item up  | Ctrl + Arrow-up | N/A |
| Move item down | Ctrl + Arrow-down | N/A |

\
